title: Unified Product Master List Schema
description: A list of products for the tubbyai.com store and Alicia Alexa skill.

product_id.description: A unique identifier for the product (e.g., SKU or a simple slug).

name.description: The full name of the product.

short_name.description: A shorter, voice-friendly name for the Alexa skill (optional).

description.description: A detailed description of the product.

voice_description.description: A concise, natural-sounding description for the Alexa skill (e.g., 'a great gift for pet lovers').

affiliate_url.description: The AWS affiliate link for the product.

image_url.description: URL for the product image (for the website and Alexa APL display).

is_available.description: Flag to indicate if the product is currently available.
